[00:05.28]Stretch my hands to you
[00:07.34]Lifelike this is what your life like
[00:09.43]Try to live your life right
[00:10.83]People really know you
[00:11.66]Push your buttons like type write
[00:13.31]This is like a movie
[00:14.29]But it's really very lifelike
[00:16.01]Every single night right
[00:17.46]Every single fight right
[00:18.69]I was looking at the 'Gram and I don't even like likes
[00:21.41]I was screamin' at my Dad he told me
[00:23.06]It ain't Christ-like
[00:24.05]I was screamin' at the referee just like Mike
[00:26.68]Lookin' for a bright light
[00:28.05]Sigel what your life like
[00:29.39]Riding on a white bike
[00:30.62]Feeling like excite bike
[00:32.04]Pressin' on the gas supernova for a night light
[00:34.71]Screamin' at my dad and he told me
[00:36.34]It ain't Christ-like
[00:37.34]But nobody never tell you when you're being like Christ
[00:40.05]Only ever seein' me only when they needin' me
[00:42.74]Like if Tyler Perry made a movie for BET
[00:45.35]Searchin' for a deity now you wanna see it free
[00:48.05]Now you wanna see if we
[00:49.45]Let's just see if three a piece
[00:50.76]Tell me what your life like turn it down a bright light
[00:53.34]Drivin' with my dad and he told me
[00:55.01]It ain't Christ-like
[00:56.04]I'm just tryna find
[00:57.02]I've been lookin' for a new way
[00:58.66]I'm just really tryna not to really do the fool way
[01:01.41]I don't have a cool way
[01:02.79]Bein' on my best though
[01:04.05]Block 'em on the text though
[01:05.41]Nothin' else next though
[01:06.66]Not another word letter picture or a decimal
[01:09.42]Wrestlin' with God I don't really want to wrestle
[01:12.00]Man it's really lifelike everything in my life
[01:14.66]Arguing with my dad and he said
[01:16.20]It ain't Christ-like
[01:18.42]Man
[01:24.07]You know it's like
[01:27.18]Somebody only close who can get you like off your
[01:30.57]I be on my
[01:31.89]I woke up this morning I said my prayers
[01:34.41]I'm all good then I tried to talk to my dad

data.trans:
[ti:Follow God]
[ar:Kanye West]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.29]上帝 我伸出
[00:05.28]我向你伸出双手
[00:07.34]栩栩如生 你的生活就是这样
[00:09.43]你想好好地生活
[00:10.83]人们真的了解你
[00:11.66]总是骚扰你
[00:13.31]这就像一部电影
[00:14.29]但真的太逼真
[00:16.01]每一个夜晚
[00:17.46]每一次抗争
[00:18.69]我看着Instagram 不喜欢点赞
[00:21.41]我对着父亲大吼大叫 他告诉我
[00:23.06]这跟上帝无关
[00:24.05]我就像迈克尔·乔丹一样对着裁判大吼大叫
[00:26.68]寻找一线光明
[00:28.05]你过着什么样的生活
[00:29.39]骑着一辆白色自行车
[00:30.62]感觉在玩《Excitebike》游戏
[00:32.04]加速前进 用超新星的光芒照亮黑夜
[00:34.71]对着父亲大吼大叫 他告诉我
[00:36.34]这跟上帝无关
[00:37.34]但当你像上帝一样时 没人会提醒你
[00:40.05]只有当他们需要我时 他们眼里才有我
[00:42.74]就像Tyler Perry为BET拍了一部电影
[00:45.35]寻找上帝 现在你想解放自己
[00:48.05]现在你想看看我们可不可以
[00:49.45]让我们看看有没有可能
[00:50.76]告诉我 你的生活是什么样 遮挡耀眼的光芒
[00:53.34]和父亲坐在车里 他告诉我
[00:55.01]这跟上帝无关
[00:56.04]我只想找到
[00:57.02]我一直在寻找新生活
[00:58.66]我真的不想像个傻瓜一样
[01:01.41]我没有好办法
[01:02.79]但我已经尽了力
[01:04.05]屏蔽他们的话语 
[01:05.41]将来不再有瓜葛
[01:06.66]再也不说话 再也不写信 再也不发照片 彻底隔绝
[01:09.42]与上帝抗争 我不想抗争
[01:12.00]朋友 我生活中的一切都太真实
[01:14.66]和父亲争吵 他说
[01:16.20]这跟上帝无关
[01:18.42]朋友
[01:24.07]你知道 这就像
[01:27.18]有人只愿意和对自己有益的人接触
[01:30.57]我只顾自己
[01:31.89]早上醒来 念祷词
[01:34.41]我很好 然后我想跟我父亲说话
[01:37.28]给他一点建议 然后他开始批评我
[01:40.24]我还嘴 他说 这跟上帝无关
[01:42.70]我说 啊
